title: Ceremonial Cofradía Runner
description: Woven panel, white background; pairs of warp stripes are divided by high-relief squares; four sections of loos warp threads; fastened by three weft woven stripes; silk brocade decorations in geometric patterns and stripes in gold, purple, magenta and green.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
